Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to purchase it at an introductory price of $140. This special offer is available for a limited time only, so don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer
